ComicInfo.Summary:
Gliding through the streets of the fate-filled city of Bete Noire, the Fallen Angel has been a force both for good and evil. But her origins have remained as mystery-cloaked as the Angel herself... until now. See the truth of her background unfold for the first time as the most formidable opponent she's ever faced tracks her down with an offer that she may not be able to refuse... even though, in accepting it, the life she knows may well be over.
City Magistrate Dr. Juris attempts to pass on his responsibility for Bete Noir to his son. Lady Xia, the Magistrate's wife, hires Angel to do some work for her. Fallen Angel has a confrontation with an old adversary, Malachi.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 10:58:22. [CVDB110262]
ComicInfo.Characters: Benny, Doctor Juris, Dolf, Jubal, Jude, Lee, Malachi, Slate, Xia
